faq:
### Define ‘cannot be made subtractively’
> Answer:
1. That cannot be fabricated with 3 axis limitations OR even if it’s possible to make it, it is too complicated.

checklist: Explained the the GUI that you made and how you did it
Outlined problems and how you fixed them
tasks.description: Write an application that interfaces with an [input](http://academy.cba.mit.edu/classes/input_devices/index.html) and/or [output](http://academy.cba.mit.edu/classes/output_devices/index.html) device --that you made--, comparing as many tool options as possible.
tasks.name: Interface and Application Programming
outcomes: Interpret and implement design and programming protocols to create a Graphic User Interface (GUI).
